Class BookingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • BookingSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CsvTools

    public class BookingSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements CsvTools
    A class with tools for managing the system

    • Method Detail

      • getRoomsFromFile

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.util.TreeMap<Room,java.lang.Integer>> getRoomsFromFile()
        Reads hotel info from a hotel information CSV file and returns the Rooms and Room count for each hotel. Example: If you had a file with 3 hotels, 5-star: Deluxe Single 45 Deluxe Double 10 4-star: Executive Single 40 Executive Double 30 3-star: Classic Family 10 Classic Single 20 It would return a TreeMap with the hotel name e.g. 5-star mapped to a treemap with eg. Deluxe Single and the Integer value 45
        Returns:
        the non-null TreeMap containing hotel names and the room and number of rooms that hotel has

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom(java.lang.String hotelName,
                    java.lang.String roomType)
        Retrieves hotel Name and the room identified by the roomType
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the hotel name
        roomType - the room type
        Returns:
        types of room in the hotel named

      • getAllRooms

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.util.TreeMap<Room,java.lang.Integer>> getAllRooms()
        Returns all the rooms that have been read into the system
        Returns:
        a TreeMap of the rooms and their amounts per hotel

      • getCurrentRooms

        public java.util.TreeMap<Room,java.lang.Integer> getCurrentRooms(java.lang.String hotelName,
                                                                 java.time.LocalDate from,
                                                                 java.time.LocalDate to)
        Returns a tree map of the rooms and their available number for the time period specified by the from and to parameters
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel in question
        from - the date at the start of the time period
        to - the date at the end of the time period
        Returns:
        a TreeMap with a rooms and their corresponding number of rooms available in the hotel during this period

      • getReservations

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<Reservation>> getReservations()
        Returns a TreeMap all reservations in each hotel
        Returns:
        the TreeMap with hotel names and the reservations in that hotel

      • getHotelStays

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<HotelStay>> getHotelStays()
        Returns all the hotel stays for each hotel
        Returns:
        the treemap with stays for each hotel

      • getReservations

        public java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> getReservations(java.lang.String hotelName,
                                                        java.lang.String name,
                                                        java.time.LocalDate checkIn)
        Returns a single reservation specified by the name and the checkIn date
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel
        name - the name of the customer who owns the reservation
        checkIn - the check in date
        Returns:
        a list of reservations matching the name and checkout date, null if the hotel doesn't exist

      • getReservation

        public Reservation getReservation(java.lang.String hotelName,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.time.LocalDate checkIn,
                                  int number)
        Returns a single reservation specified by the name and the checkIn date
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel
        name - the name of the customer who owns the reservation
        checkIn - the check in date
        number - the booking number
        Returns:
        a reservation if the map of reservations contains the reservation, null if not

      • onlyBookingOnCheckInDate

        public boolean onlyBookingOnCheckInDate(java.lang.String hotelName,
                                        java.lang.String name,
                                        java.time.LocalDate checkin)
        Checks if there is no other reservation for the same checkin date for the same person on the system
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel
        name - the name of the person making the reservation
        checkin - the checkin date for the reservation
        Returns:
        if this is the only reservation for this person for this checkin date

      • removeReservation

        public boolean removeReservation(java.lang.String hotelName,
                                 Reservation reservation,
                                 boolean cancellation)
        Removes the reservation from the system for the hotel provided both the hotel name and reservation exist
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel to which the reservation belongs
        reservation - the reservation to be cancelled
        cancellation - true if it's a cancellation, false if its being removed from the system
        Returns:
        true if the reservation was removed successfully

      • addReservation

        public boolean addReservation(java.lang.String hotelName,
                              Reservation reservation)
        Adds a new reservation to the list of reservations for the particular hotel
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel owned by the chain e.g 5-star
        reservation - the reservation to be added
        Returns:
        true if the reservation was successfully added

      • addHotelStay

        public boolean addHotelStay(java.lang.String hotelName,
                            HotelStay stay)
        Adds a hotel stay to the system
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel
        stay - the hotel stay to add
        Returns:
        if the system does not have the hotel, you cannot possibly have a hotel stay for a new hotel, if no reservation was made first, so will return false

      • getHotelStay

        public HotelStay getHotelStay(java.lang.String hotelName,
                              Reservation r)
        Gets a particular hotel stay
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel
        r - the reservation concerned with a hotel stay
        Returns:
        the hotel stay if present, null otherwise

      • removeHotelStay

        public boolean removeHotelStay(java.lang.String hotelName,
                               HotelStay stay)
        Removes a hotelStay from the system
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel to remove the stay from
        stay - the stay to remove
        Returns:
        true if the stay exists and it was successfully removed

      • isStayed

        public boolean isStayed(java.lang.String hotelName,
                        Reservation r)
        Checks if the reservation has been processed to a hotel stay
        Parameters:
        hotelName - the name of the hotel
        r - the reservation
        Returns:
        if the reservation has been processed to a stay

      • writeReservationsToFile

        public void writeReservationsToFile(boolean reservationOrCancellation,
                                    boolean hotelStay)
        Writes reservations or cancellations to a file
        Parameters:
        reservationOrCancellation - if true, reservations will be written to the file, if false, cancellations
        hotelStay - true if writing a hotel stay to file, false if not. Note reservationOrCancellation must be true also

      • writeDataToFile

                            java.lang.Object[][] data)
        Writes data into a file
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        filePath - location of the file
        data - is the data being put into the file

        Reads in data from the specified filePath and reads it into an Object matrix
        Specified by:
        readDataFromFile in interface CsvTools
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file
        Returns:
        the data found

      • updateFiles

        public void updateFiles(java.lang.String type)
        Updates the specified file
        Parameters:
        type - type can be Reservations, Cancellations or Stays
